name: WINN STRATEGIES ON BEHALF OF THE PEW CHARITABLE TRUSTS
description: The Pew Charitable Trusts is a global nongovernmental organization/foundation
sampleDescriptions: On behalf of Pew Broadband Initiative, supporting broadband deployment initiatives
Encouraging research-based broadband policies to connect communities and preserve a role for the states. Including broadband funding in infrastructure legislation.
